article_title: Sam Youngman: Will Jack Conway embrace Kynect or run from it?
article_text: As Democrat Jack Conway gets his gubernatorial campaign underway in earnest, many Democrats are asking: Will Conway run on the health care exchange and Medicaid expansion implemented by Gov. Steve Beshear or will he avoid it like the plague because it was birthed by President Barack Obama?

article_summary:
As Democrat Jack Conway gets his gubernatorial campaign underway in earnest, many Democrats are asking: Will Conway run on the health care exchange and Medicaid expansion implemented by Gov.
Steve Beshear or will he avoid it like the plague because it was birthed by President Barack Obama?
